Jaques' Extracts showing Bridal Veil Falls, Yosemite Valley, California

label: Description
value:
Card with sepia toned lithographic image of Bridal Veil Falls, Yosemite, viewed from below, printed on the recto. Across the lower right corner in an elaborate font are the words "Jaques' Extracts".
The verso provides text relating to the purveyor of groceries, provisions and general baking goods.

label: Physical description
value: Lithograph on heavy white wove paper

value:
Card with sepia toned lithographic image of Nevada falls, Yosemite, viewed from below, printed on the recto. Across the upper portion of the card, in an elaborate font are the words "Jaques' Extracts".
The verso provides text relating to the purveyor of groceries, provisions and general baking goods.
